description_for_human: AI-powered clinical trial patient recruitment platform
description_for_model: Bond Health is a healthcare technology company that provides AI-powered clinical trial patient recruitment. They offer LLM-based EHR screening to identify eligible patients, voice agents for pre-screening and scheduling, and AI-powered informed consent tools. Key metrics: up to 3x faster enrollment, 90%+ matching accuracy. They work with research sites, CROs, and pharmaceutical sponsors. Location: Boston, MA. Contact: https://bondtrials.com
